1461320.name: Yami
1461320.description:
YAMI is a third-person, 3D, narrative-led puzzle platformer.

A warrior dreams of a small boy with no memory. In her dream, she travels with him on a quest through long-forgotten places and deep into the dark shadows of the unknown to find a mythical entity known as YAMI.

As they journey, our heroes unlock lost stories and secrets, encounter spirits and gods, and finally discover what lies at the very heart of darkness.
1461320.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
